thread.title: 'Shame on OHSU' for 'gouging those least able to pay': Letters to the Editor
thread.title_full: 'Shame on OHSU' for 'gouging those least able to pay': Letters to the Editor | OregonLive.com

author: Letters to the editor
title: 'Shame on OHSU' for 'gouging those least able to pay': Letters to the Editor
text:
Health care billing: Regarding "OHSU sued over $31,000 bill," (Sept. 29): Congratulations to Claire Amos for suing Oregon Health & Science University over its billing/charging practices. "Unconscionable" is putting it mildly when it comes to charging the uninsured up to 50 percent more than those with coverage from insurance companies. Shame on OHSU and every hospital in the nation that thinks gouging those least able to pay is acceptable in any way. This type of suit should be filed against all of them. Not being notified of the charges is the least of the problem.
Maurine Audel
Clackamas
